name: Hallway Creep
description:
You have stumbled upon a dark hallway with seemingly no way out. You only have a hand cranked flashlight with you to illuminate your way through the darkness. But you hear some noises...what is it??

Creeping toward you from the darkness are green little monsters. You shine your flashlight at them and they seem to be bothered by it!

Unfortunately, you must keep your flashlight charged to stay a live. To do so, Press 'z' and '\' consecutively  to charge the flashlight

Press 'Spacebar' to start
